comments.text:
K, I know I'm super late to this (possibly too late) but what/where did 
this come from? The only other video this guy has that isn't about MLP is 
the Turntable Turnabout, which came from Ace Atourney. Does he have an 
alternative art sight, because I don't get what where all these guys came 
from. (I know Mystery is his profile pic, but none of his other videos even 
have a pony that resembles him.)﻿
